name: website-api
description: Serverless back-end for Case Consulting website

scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build && npm run package:dev && npm run deploy:packaged:dev
scripts.deploy:packaged:dev: sam deploy --template-file packaged.yaml --stack-name website-api-dev --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --region us-east-1
scripts.invoke:upload: bucket=website-api-dev sam local invoke UploadFunction --event events/upload.json
